laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Feces test for C. difficile toxin A & B
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).
Bicarbonate of 20 mmol/L, which is below normal range (ref range lower: 22 mmol/L).
Lactate of 1.4 mmol/L, which is within normal range.
Troponin elevated to 0.17 ng/mL in the setting of sepsis and renal failure.
